document_data.name: River Umber
document_data.mainbody:
The '''River Umber''' was a fast-flowing river full of cascades that formed part of the natural borders between [[Aglarond]], [[Thesk]], and [[Thay]].

{{quote|''The River Umber rolled lazily through the plain, cutting a broad course into Aglarond. The Umber regularly overflowed its banks because of the Red Wizardâ€™s rain spells, helping to keep the area fertile. ''}}

Geography.Flora & Fauna: The river banks were muddy and fertile. Fields of wild wheat, [[walnut]]s, [[hickory|hickories]], and [[oak]]s grew along its banks.

document_data.Trade: Vessels could navigate the river, all the way to the eastern end of Lake Umber. Thay often sent trade ships down the river into the Sea of Dlurg and the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
